title: Skill-Lync ties up with Renault Nissan Tech to train, upskill professionals - Business Standard
content: Skill-Lync ties up with Renault Nissan Tech to train, upskill professionals  Business Standard
description: Education technology start-up Skill-Lync on Monday said it has partnered with Renault Nissan Technology & Business Centre India (RNTBCI) for training and up-skilling of professionals
